projects.title: Junkyard Brawl
projects.body: Designed and developed a two-player 2D fighting game over ten weeks on a team of four using the Unity game engine.

projects.title: Thread Library
projects.body: Implemented a functional multithreading library on a three-person team using low-level C/C++.

projects.title: Client-Side Instagram Clone
projects.body: Created an Instagram clone with client-side rendering and a REST API using React, Flask, and a SQLite database

projects.title: Software Synthesizer & Transcriber
projects.body: Built a GUI software synthesizer that allowed the user to design their own sounds through additive synthesis.

projects.title: FM Synthesizer Plugin
projects.body: Currently designing & developing an FM synthesizer DAW plugin using the JUCE C++ audio framework.

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
experience.body:
Researched and developed technologies to automate Android accessibility testing for the flagship Capital One app, potentially saving up to 120 developer hours every sprint once integrated.
â€¢ Facilitated a small team of interns to build an internal app and website using the cross-platform Flutter framework.

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
experience.body:
Designed a prototype mill communication application to pull data from production CNC mills using TCP sockets, providing a vital proof-of-concept to developers to guide communication projects going forward.
Developed production C++ code in an agile environment to improve user throughput and experience.
